meanings.definition: An infectious agent that consists solely of protein and is responsible for several fatal neurodegenerative diseases in humans and animals.
meanings.sent1: The prion caused a serious brain disease in the sheep.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying how prions can lead to brain disorders.
meanings.sent3: The prion decided to throw a party in the brain, but no one showed up.
meanings.sent4: The prion was like a silent assassin, slowly destroying the brain.
meanings.sent5: The image of the prion eating away at the brain stuck in my mind.
